definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.chinese: 那些男孩们的便帽还新。

sentences.english: The old man in a black cap is the former headmaster of the school.
sentences.chinese: 那个带着黑色便帽的老人是这个学校的前任校长。

sentences.english: The size of Pooh stuffed toys ranges from Beanie and miniature to human-sized.
sentences.chinese: 维尼填充玩具的大小范围从无檐小便帽，微型无异。

sentences.english: My brother bought a new cap for himself .
sentences.chinese: 我的哥哥为自己买了一顶便帽。

sentences.english: From caps to crowns, the hat has long been the peak of fashion.
sentences.chinese: 从便帽到皇冠，帽子一直是时尚的顶端。

sentences.english: Her cap is of the same shape as mine.
sentences.chinese: 她的便帽式样和我的相同。

definition: Chinese skullcap resembling the skin of half a watermelon
cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
buttoned mandarin jacket of the Qing dynasty 清代[Qing1 dai4] (1644-1911)
variant of 長筒靴|长筒靴[chang2 tong3 xue1]
